caption.p: Growth inhibition of cancer cell lines. ( a) Growth inhibition of MCF-7, H460 and MOLT-4 cells in vitro, assessed by MTT assay 72 h after the addition of Thymus vulgaris L . essential oil. ( b) Growth inhibition of MOLT-4, H460 and MCF-7 cells in vitro, assessed by MTT assay 72 h after the addition of doxorubicin.
